long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Translate any text from websites quickly. Add to your personal dictionary on Lingo-trainer.com to learn and phrases with our training.

Get to know a convenient way to translate words, phrases and even whole texts on any page on the Internet using the Lingo Trainer extension.

To get a translation, simply select a word or phrase on the page, open the context menu and select "Translate with Lingo Trainer".

Add unfamiliar words to your personal dictionary and practice them with interactive training.
